ValidationMessage.name: CasBoUserFillInAllValues
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBoUserTimeIntervalZero
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter a time interval greater than 0.
ValidationMessage.comment: Time interval in sync must be greater than 0.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBoUserNoOpenTimeCard
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: No open time card available. You can create one manually.
ValidationMessage.comment: Time Card- Message about current situation.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBoUserRunningTimeEntryByCall
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: There is a open time entry for a #subject# Call. The time entry stared at #startTime#. With the confirmation of this message the system will capture the current time as end time of this time entry.
ValidationMessage.comment: Time Card- Message about running time entry created by Call.
